TableSpec.Name: MIMED Interaction batch table
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about MIMED interaction batch records
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

ForeignKeyField.Description: Indicates which fundraiser should be responsible for this interaction (i.e. Owner)
ForeignKeyField.Name: FUNDRAISERID

CodeTableField.Description: Indicates which stage of the plan this step belongs to.
CodeTableField.Name: PROSPECTPLANSTATUSCODEID

ComputedColumnField.Name: COMPLETED
ComputedColumnField.Expression: case when dbo.UFN_USR_INTERACTION_STATUSCODE_GETDESCRIPTION(STATUSCODEID) in ('Planned','Pending') then 0 else 1 end

ComputedColumnField.Name: ISINTERACTION
ComputedColumnField.Expression: case when INTERACTIONTYPECODEID is null then 0 else 1 end

ForeignKeyField.Description: Indicates that the interaction took place during a specific event.
ForeignKeyField.Name: EVENTID

CodeTableField.Description: Indicates which stage of the request this step belongs to.
CodeTableField.Name: FUNDINGREQUESTSTAGECODEID

HourMinuteField.Description: Expected starting time of the interaction.
HourMinuteField.Name: EXPECTEDSTARTTIME

HourMinuteField.Description: Expected ending time of the interaction.
HourMinuteField.Name: EXPECTEDENDTIME

BooleanField.Description: Flags this interaction as all day.
BooleanField.Name: ISALLDAYEVENT

HourMinuteField.Description: Actual starting time of the interaction.
HourMinuteField.Name: ACTUALSTARTTIME

HourMinuteField.Description: Actual ending time of the interaction.
HourMinuteField.Name: ACTUALENDTIME

ComputedColumnField.Description: The expected start date and time of the interaction.
ComputedColumnField.Name: EXPECTEDSTARTDATETIME
ComputedColumnField.Expression: dateadd(mi, convert(tinyint, substring(EXPECTEDSTARTTIME, 3, 2)), dateadd(hh, convert(tinyint, substring(EXPECTEDSTARTTIME, 1, 2)), convert(datetime, convert(date, EXPECTEDDATE))))

ComputedColumnField.Description: The expected end date and time of the interaction.
ComputedColumnField.Name: EXPECTEDENDDATETIME
ComputedColumnField.Expression: dateadd(mi, convert(tinyint, substring(EXPECTEDENDTIME, 3, 2)), dateadd(hh, convert(tinyint, substring(EXPECTEDENDTIME, 1, 2)), convert(datetime, convert(date, EXPECTEDDATE))))

ComputedColumnField.Description: The Actual start date and time of the interaction.
ComputedColumnField.Name: ACTUALSTARTDATETIME
ComputedColumnField.Expression: dateadd(mi, convert(tinyint, substring(ACTUALSTARTTIME, 3, 2)), dateadd(hh, convert(tinyint, substring(ACTUALSTARTTIME, 1, 2)), convert(datetime, convert(date, ACTUALDATE))))

ComputedColumnField.Description: The Actual end date and time of the interaction.
ComputedColumnField.Name: ACTUALENDDATETIME
ComputedColumnField.Expression: dateadd(mi, convert(tinyint, substring(ACTUALENDTIME, 3, 2)), dateadd(hh, convert(tinyint, substring(ACTUALENDTIME, 1, 2)), convert(datetime, convert(date, ACTUALDATE))))

ComputedColumnField.Name: STARTTIME
ComputedColumnField.Expression: coalesce((case when ACTUALSTARTTIME = '' then null else ACTUALSTARTTIME end),EXPECTEDSTARTTIME)

ComputedColumnField.Name: ENDTIME
ComputedColumnField.Expression: coalesce((case when ACTUALENDTIME = '' then null else ACTUALENDTIME end) ,EXPECTEDENDTIME)

CheckConstraint.Name: CK_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCH_ACTUALDATENOTIME
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: ACTUALDATE is null or ACTUALDATE = cast(ACTUALDATE as date)

CheckConstraint.Name: CK_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCH_EXPECTEDDATENOTIME
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: EXPECTEDDATE is null or EXPECTEDDATE = cast(EXPECTEDDATE as date)

CheckConstraint.Name: CK_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCH_HASSTATUSWHENREQUESTSTEP
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: (FUNDINGREQUESTSTAGECODEID is null and FUNDINGREQUESTID is null) or (FUNDINGREQUESTSTAGECODEID is not null and FUNDINGREQUESTID is not null)

CheckConstraint.Name: CK_UMHS_INTERACTIONBATCH_HASREQUESTOUTLINESTEPONLYWHENREQUESTSTEP
CheckConstraint.CheckExpression: FUNDINGREQUESTOUTLINESTEPID is null or FUNDINGREQUESTID is not null
